name: n8n
description: deploy n8n to heroku without any hassle, with tailscale

GENERIC_TIMEZONE.description: Time Zone to use with Heroku. You can find the name of your timezone for example here: https://momentjs.com/timezone/.

TAILSCALE_NODE_NAME.description: Name of your app's tailscale (direct) node.

TAILSCALE_AUTHKEY.description: Tailscale tailnet authentication key.  You can create your key here:  https://login.tailscale.com/admin/settings/keys.

N8N_ENCRYPTION_KEY.description: Set the n8n encryption key to a static value to avoid Heroku overriding it (causing authentication to fail).

WEBHOOK_URL.description: Replace <heroku-app-name> with your Heroku application name. This will ensure the correct webhook URLs are being shown in n8n.

DB_POSTGRESDB_SSL_REJECT_UNAUTHORIZED.description: SSL is required to connect to Postgres on Heroku
